Health Checks Done Right

You create health and performance checks for your services, Opsee manages them for you. Checks are automatically applied to the right instances and added to new instances for you when they come online.

Learn more about health checks

Seamless AWS Integration

Opsee automatically discovers your instances, groups, and services and helps you apply health checks to them.

If you’re not using AWS, you’ll have to wait to try Opsee. Support for other platforms is coming, but not soon.

See what our AWS integration can do

No Agents! Meet Opsee’s Bastion Instance

Our Bastion Instance is a preconfigured Amazon Machine Image (AMI) that runs inside your environment. It automatically discovers your infrastructure and services, and coordinates health checking and incident response. There’s no agent to install on your systems.

Learn more about the Bastion Instance

Made for Small Teams & Small Screens

Teams writing services tend to be smaller, and are more likely to have developers on call for their own services. We’re building Opsee for you. There are no complicated dashboards, and you can use Opsee from your phone.
